original_text: Also take these ten cheeses to the commander of their thousand. See if your brothers are well, and bring some token from them.”
korean_text: 이 치즈 열 덩이를 가져다가 그들의 천부장에게 주고 네 형들의 안부를 살피고 증표를 가져오라

sentences.korean_translation: 또 이 치즈 열 개를 가져가라

sentences.original_text: to the commander of their thousand.
See if your brothers are well,
and bring some token from them.”
